channel.title: Question about posting?
channel.description:
ok so i have seen some of you guys say like click 'here' for a blah blah blah. or something like that. so how do u make it to where when you click on the 'here' it will take you to a site?
i know it is prolly pretty simple but i just cant figure it out[br][size=1]Posted at: June 24, 2006, 05:53:31 pm[/size][hr]ok guys never mind i figured it out
